DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study is designed to evaluate how lubiprostone may affect gastric motor and sensory function.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Lubiprostone on Gastric Function in Patients With Chronic Idiopathic Constipation
DOC.criteria: chronic idiopathic constipation medications that slow gastrointestinal (GI) motility prior surgery to the GI tract
DOC.keyword: no prior history of surgery to the colon
not on any type of medication that could alter gastrointestinal motility or transit
